package.name: cogency
package.docstring: Cogency - A framework for building intelligent agents.

classes.name: Agent
classes.docstring: Cognitive agent with streaming execution, tool integration, memory and adaptive reasoning.

methods.name: process
methods.docstring: Process input text with optional context for MCP compatibility
methods.signature: (self, input_text: str, context: Optional[cogency.context.Context] = None) -> str

methods.name: run
methods.docstring: Run agent and return complete response as string.

methods.name: serve_mcp
methods.docstring: Start MCP server with specified transport type
methods.signature: (self, transport: str = 'stdio', host: str = 'localhost', port: int = 8765)

methods.name: stream
methods.docstring: Stream agent execution with input validation and security checks.

methods.name: traces
methods.docstring: Get traces from last execution for debugging

classes.init_signature: (self, name: str, trace: bool = False, verbose: bool = True, **opts)

classes.name: Context
classes.docstring: Agent conversation context.

methods.name: add_message
methods.docstring: Add message to history.
methods.signature: (self, role: str, content: str, trace_id: Optional[str] = None)

methods.name: add_result
methods.docstring: Add tool result to history.
methods.signature: (self, tool_name: str, args: dict, output: dict)

methods.name: add_turn
methods.docstring: Add conversation turn.
methods.signature: (self, query: str, response: str, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)

methods.name: clear_history
methods.docstring: Clear conversation history.

methods.name: get_clean_conversation
methods.docstring: Get conversation without system messages.

methods.name: recent_turns
methods.docstring: Get last n conversation turns, filtering out system and internal messages.

classes.init_signature: (self, query: str, messages: List[Dict[str, str]] = None, tool_results: Optional[List[Dict[str, Any]]] = None, max_history: Optional[int] = 20, conversation_history: Optional[List[Dict[str, Any]]] = None, user_id: str = 'default')

classes.name: FileBackend
classes.docstring: Filesystem storage implementation.

methods.name: create
methods.docstring: CREATE - Standard artifact creation with storage delegation.
methods.signature: (self, content: str, memory_type: cogency.memory.core.MemoryType = <MemoryType.FACT: 'fact'>, tags: Optional[List[str]] = None, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, **kwargs) -> cogency.memory.core.Memory

methods.name: delete
methods.docstring: DELETE - Unified deletion with storage delegation.
methods.signature: (self, artifact_id: uuid.UUID = None, tags: Optional[List[str]] = None, filters: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, delete_all: bool = False) -> bool

methods.name: read
methods.docstring: READ - Unified retrieval with storage delegation.
methods.signature: (self, query: str = None, artifact_id: uuid.UUID = None, search_type: cogency.memory.core.SearchType = <SearchType.AUTO: 'auto'>, limit: int = 10, threshold: float = 0.7, tags: Optional[List[str]] = None, memory_type: Optional[cogency.memory.core.MemoryType] = None, filters: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, **kwargs) -> List[cogency.memory.core.Memory]

methods.name: update
methods.docstring: UPDATE - Standard update logic with storage delegation.
methods.signature: (self, artifact_id: uuid.UUID, updates: Dict[str, Any]) -> bool

classes.name: Flow
classes.docstring: LangGraph wrapper for agent workflow.
classes.init_signature: (self, llm, tools, memory: cogency.memory.core.Store, routing_table: Optional[Dict] = None, identity: Optional[str] = None, output_schema: Optional[str] = None, system_prompt: Optional[str] = None)

classes.name: Output
classes.docstring: Single source of truth for all agent output with tracing and formatting

methods.name: log_tool
methods.docstring: Log tool execution with status emoji and formatted result
methods.signature: (self, tool_name: str, result: Any, success: bool = True)

methods.name: reset_traces
methods.docstring: Clear all trace entries

methods.docstring: Route messages to appropriate output methods by type
methods.signature: (self, message_type: str, content: str, node: Optional[str] = None, **kwargs)

methods.docstring: Get tool-specific emoji for display

methods.name: trace
methods.docstring: Record trace entries for debugging and stream to callback if available

methods.docstring: Get copy of all collected trace entries

methods.name: update
methods.docstring: Display user progress updates with appropriate emoji

classes.docstring: Agent state with dict-like access.

methods.docstring: Get value from state by key, checking flow first then attributes.

classes.name: KeyManager
classes.docstring: Unified key management - auto-detects, handles rotation, eliminates provider DRY.

methods.docstring: Get the current active key.

methods.docstring: Get next key in rotation - advances every call.
